Process assay data

Retrieve Assay Tables from an ISA object.

Convenience functions

getStudyFileNames()

Retrieve the Study Identifier(s) and Study File Name(s) from an ISA object.

getAssayFileNames()

Retrieve the Assay File Name(s) per Study from an ISA object.
